# Agility, Greater [synergy] (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
As *[[Agility (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|agility]]*, except the armor grants a +5 resistance bonus on Reflex saving throws.

Strong; (DC 22) transmutation; CL 15th; Synergy Prequisite: Improved agility; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Cat's Grace (Spell)|catâ€™s grace]], [[Resistance (Spell)|resistance]]*; Price +8,000 gp

**Source:** Magic Item Compendium (WotC), pg. 6
